Headline: #70 Division Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Dearborn/Walton
ShortDescription: Eastbound 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Dearborn, Oak, and Clark (Layover) due to street blockage near Dearborn/Walton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Dearborn, Oak, and Clark (Layover) due to street blockage near Dearborn/Walton.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at Loyola. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at Loyola.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green and Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green and Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at State/Lake due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green and Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at State/Lake due to police activity.  Some trains will be held back and rerouted in the loop for continuing service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green and Brown Line Trains on Loop 'L' rerouted
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green and Brown Line Loop service has been rerouted via the Inner Loop (Orange Line side) due to police activity at State/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green and Brown Line Loop service has been rerouted via the Inner Loop (Orange Line side) due to police activity at State/Lake.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We appreciate your patience as we work to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
